MuelSyseKhas:Fluid.NAME: FlowingShape
DESCRIPTIONS: Can trigger special effects of certain cards, can evolve into other FlowingShapes

MuelSyseKhas:Bio.NAME: Ecology
DESCRIPTIONS: Can trigger special effects of certain cards, will not be consumed by cards, decreases by one each turn

MuelSyseKhas:FluidAdd.NAME: FlowingShapeGrowth
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, gain #b%d points of #yFlowingShape.

MuelSyseKhas:BlockFluid.NAME: FlowingShape:Defender
DESCRIPTIONS: Can trigger special effects of certain cards. At the start of the turn, gain #b%d points of Block.

MuelSyseKhas:AttackFluid.NAME: FlowingShape:Guard
DESCRIPTIONS: Can trigger special effects of certain cards. At the start of the turn, deal #b%d points of Damage to all enemies.

MuelSyseKhas:RandomBuff.NAME: UnstableMatrix
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the turn, randomly gain #b%d points of any form of FlowingShape, Ecology, or FlowingShapeGrowth.

MuelSyseKhas:CambrianPower.NAME: Cambrian Explosion
DESCRIPTIONS: After #b%d turns, gain [E] [E] [E], 3 points of Ecology, #b%d points of FlowingShape:Guard and FlowingShape:Defender.

MuelSyseKhas:SlowAndSteadyPower.NAME: Stream
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the turn, add #b%d Gurgle cards to your hand.

MuelSyseKhas:EnergyFluid.NAME: FlowingShape:Vanguard
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #b%d attack cards gain [E] [E] and draw 1 card.
